SEARCH
Package clutter.abstractwidgets

Class Widget

java.lang.Object
clutter.abstractwidgets.Widget
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClickEventController.ClickEventHandler, clutter.debug.Debuggable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MockWidget, NullWidget, ParentWidget, Rectangle, Text, TopWindowOld
public abstract class Widget extends Object implements clutter.debug.Debuggable, ClickEventController.ClickEventHandler
The base class for all widgets in the Clutter framework. Widgets are the building blocks of the UI and are responsible for rendering themselves and handling user input.
